metadata.name: Capsh Shell Invocation - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the "capsh" utility to invoke a shell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/capsh')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --')))

output.summary: Detects the use of the "capsh" utility to invoke a shell.
